select * from (
select tmtc.* ,
( select IFNULL(count(1) ,0) from tb_order tor1 where tor1.trade_code_id = tmtc.id and TO_DAYS(tor1.create_time) = TO_DAYS(now()) ) as dayReceiveNum ,
( select IFNULL(sum(tor1.order_amount) ,0) from tb_order tor1 where tor1.pay_status = 'payed' and tor1.trade_code_id = tmtc.id and TO_DAYS(tor1.create_time) = TO_DAYS(now()) ) as dayReceiveAmount
from tb_merchant_trade_code tmtc where tmtc.merchant_id = #{merchantId} and tmtc.channel_id = #{payChannelId} and tmtc.enabled = 1
) tab where (dayReceiveAmount + ${orderAmount}) <= tab.day_amount_limit order by dayReceiveNum asc , dayReceiveAmount asc limit 0 , 1

select * from tb_order where trade_code_num = #{codeNum} and (create_time between date_add(now(), interval - 5 minute) and now()) and pay_status = 'waitPay' and format(pay_float_amount , 2) = format(${amount},2) and pay_way in ('lzyhZfb' , 'lzyhWechat')
